title: CO-VIRAL App
text: A group project to create a resource for reliable information during the COVID-19 pandemic.

title: Stay Home Activity Finder
alt: App screenshot recipe finder and workouts
text: This app finds recipes and exercises that work with what a user already has at home.

title: Work Day Scheduler
text: An app that will save events in one hour time blocks for the work day.

title: Weather Dashboard
text: >A simple app that displays the current day and 5 day weather information for a city.
